Judul: DEVELOPING CORPORATE STRATEGY ON NEW BUSINESSES AT PT. GRAND KARTECH
Abstrak:
Steel and boiler manufacturing industry is heavily related to domestic economic growth where most of demands are initiated from investment for expansion or new ventures. The fluctuation of the industry also depends on new technology with better efficiency and fuel price. In addition the overall industry is also affected by competition. Seemingly those factors all contributes to problems in the company which apparently facing sales cut  
 

down, diminishing income and loosing competitiveness. Overcoming the problems would require a comprehensive corporate strategy which aiming majorly in seeking new  
 

business orientation that comes with new business development. There are three business options that need to be analyzed. With new business becoming new portfolio, it is expected to leverage companyÃ‚Â’s financial condition in next future.  
 

The methodology used in the paper is divided to two major analyses, first by evaluating internal capability and second by assessing external factors. The internal is evaluated by comparing existing capabilities over expected capabilities of each business options, the comparison shows the capability gap, the smaller the number, the bigger the gap is, consequently, bigger investment to leverage the capability. The external factors are  
 

evaluated based on two aspects: five forces frame work and market analysis. Together all results from internal and external analyses plotted in Industry Attractiveness Ã‚Â– Business Strength (IA-BS) matrix to grade the three business options. To recognize the market nature of each business options, market positioning for each business options is used.  
 

The result will be in the form of the choice of one best business portfolio. The result of internal analyses and external factors are plotted in TOWS matrix to generate strategy initiative for corporate level of the best business portfolio. It is highly expected that the  
 

new business will then gain best competitive positions in the market, whilst production quality is managed at high efficiency as the capability match with the business.
Kata Kunci: Industri manufaktur boiler, pertumbuhan ekonomi domestik
